started to feel cold. His legs were getting chilly and he wished he had put on his pants. Tom's friends saw him and laughed at him for not wearing his pants. Tom felt very silly.
Tom ran back home to put on his pants. His mom saw him and said, "You need to finish getting dressed before you go outside." Tom put on his pants and went back outside to play. He was not cold anymore, and his friends stopped laughing at him. Tom learned to listen to his mom and to not be so foolish.
